DOC.brief_summary: In previous study explore specific sequence MRI ( susceptibility weight imaging ( SWI ) arterial spin labeling ( ASL ) ) , investigator show great sensibility MRI sequence detect arteriovenous shunt , compare angiography imaging ( static dynamic ) . This prospective study aim compare multisequence MRI brain arteriography image patient undergo brain arteriovenous malformation embolization .
